{"step_by_step_thinking": "Increased patient awareness can potentially improve accrual into cancer-related clinical trials for several reasons. Firstly, when patients are more aware of the existence and benefits of clinical trials, they may be more likely to consider participating. This can lead to a larger pool of potential participants, increasing the chances of meeting recruitment goals. Secondly, increased awareness can help patients make informed decisions about whether or not to participate in a clinical trial. They can weigh the potential risks and benefits and discuss their options with their healthcare providers. Lastly, increased patient awareness can also lead to increased awareness among healthcare providers, who may then be more likely to refer eligible patients to clinical trials. Overall, increased patient awareness has the potential to positively impact accrual into cancer-related clinical trials.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
